column6: SKIN CONDITIONING - EMOLLIENT, HAIR CONDITIONING, SKIN CONDITIONING, SOLVENT
column7: Cyclopentasiloxane is the cyclic dimethyl polysiloxane that conforms to the formula:

Niacinamide, also known as nicotinamide, is a form of vitamin B3. It is widely recognized for its multifunctional benefits in skincare formulations. In cosmetics, niacinamide is lauded for its ability to improve the appearance of enlarged pores, uneven skin tone, fine lines, and dullness. It works by helping to build proteins in the skin and locking in moisture to prevent environmental damage.
